# **gpu-load-balancer**
GPU load balancing module

## Getting Started
```
git clone -b gpu-load-balancer/master https://github.com/amuzlab/node-module.git
npm install
```

### Requires
* [Node.js 8.X 이상 버전](https://nodejs.org/en/docs/)

### Installing
```
npm login
npm install @amuzlab/gpu-load-balancer --save
```

### Branch naming convention
```
git branch <module name>/<sub branch name>

ex) git branch gpu-load-balancer/master
ex) git branch gpu-load-balancer/develop
```

### Annotated tag naming convention
```
git tag -a <module name>/<tag name>

ex) git tag -a gpu-load-balancer/1.0.0
```

### Create docs
```
npm run create-doc
```

### Create package
```
npm pack
```

### Examples
```
const gpuLoadBalancer = require('@amuzlab/gpu-load-balancer')

gpuLoadBalancer.getGPU()
    .then(gpu => console.log(gpu))
    .catch(err => console.error(err))

gpuLoadBalancer.getGPU({algorithm: 'ROUND_ROBIN_MEM'})
    .then(gpu => console.log(gpu))
    .catch(err => console.error(err))

gpuLoadBalancer.getGPU('ROUND_ROBIN_MEM')
    .then(gpu => console.log(gpu))
    .catch(err => console.error(err))
```
